title: And I John Saw the Holy City, New Jerusalem, Coming Down from God out of Heaven (Et moi, Jean, je vis la sainte cité, la nouvelle Jérusalem, qui descendait du ciel, d'auprès de Dieu) from Apocalypse of Saint John (Apocalypse de Saint-Jean)
medium: Lithograph with chine collé from a portfolio of 13 lithographs (12 with chine collé)
credits: Gift of The Ian Woodner Family Collection
